      • generateDropSchemaScript

        public java.lang.String[] generateDropSchemaScript(org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect inDialect)
                                            throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
        This method deals with postgres database. We create constraints for this table in an upgrade action. Hibernate mapping doesn't know about it and does not generate drop constraint script, so we do it manually here
        Overrides:
        generateDropSchemaScript in class org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration
        Parameters:
        inDialect - database dialect
        Returns:
        array of scrings with drop statements
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - the exception might be thrown

      • generateSchemaCreationScript

        public java.lang.String[] generateSchemaCreationScript(org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect inDialect)
                                                throws org.hibernate.HibernateException
        This method deals with boolean datatype on Postgres. On the newly installed database (version > 8.3) boolean datatype has no implicit casting of numeric 0/1 We cannot create cast in advance, so we replace them with supported '0' and '1'
        Overrides:
        generateSchemaCreationScript in class org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration
        Parameters:
        inDialect - database dialect
        Returns:
        array of scrings with DDL statements
        Throws:
        org.hibernate.HibernateException - the exception might be thrown
